overview: Vlad gets to organize the Vampire Ball this year. It is a great honor for him and he wants to do his utmost to make it a great party. Keelin and Wilko help Vlad organize the prom, but things don't go as expected... A creature from the underworld shows up. Can the Night Watch ensure that the party can go on without a hitch?
title: Nachtwacht Show - Het Vampierenbal
